property.name: locationName
property.label: Location Name
property.datasource: Legend Boats Barrie, Legend Boats Montreal, Legend Boats Sudbury

property.name: layout
property.label: Layout
property.description: TIP: Expanded includes a large map; only use it where there is room.

property.name: sectionWidth
property.label: Maximum Width of Section
property.datasource: Screen, Container, Wide, Average, Thin, Extra Thin
property.description: Don't use with Condensed. Relative to containing element. Screen = Full Width of Screen, Container = Full Width of Containing Element, Wide = 1645px, Average = 1300px, Thin = 1080px, Extra Thin = 780px
